All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AiPlayer
AiPlayer is a class for artificial intelligence to play against player.
Bishop
 
Board
Board is one of the main classes of the whole project.
BoardView
BoardView is class which shows board.
ButtonCoord
ButtonCoord is class which stores button coordinates.
ClickListener
ClickListener is ActionListener which is called if the user clicks in the game on square where is piece or dot.
Client
Client is one of the main classes of the whole project.
ClientHandler
ClientHandler is class which handles client (online).
Color
Color is an enumeration for colors.
EditorListener
EditorListener is ActionListener which is on every button in editor.
Game
Game is one of the main classes of the whole project.
Game.Pair<T>
This method helps diff method to find difference between two Strings.
GameHistory
GameHistory is class for storing games which were played on server.
GameHistoryButton
This class is custom button with added GameHistory field.
GameType
GameType is an enumeration for game types.
Helpers
Helpers is a class in which all helping methods are stored.
HistoryServer
HistoryServer is class which handles history of online games.
IPiece
IPiece is an interface which is a pattern for all pieces.
King
 
Knight
 
LastGamesView
LastGameView serves as GUI for showing all already played games.
Logger
Logger is a class for error handling purposes.
Main
 
MainController
 
MainController1
 
MainMenu
MainMenu is the main class and component of the application.
Pawn
 
Player
Player is a class for more convenient game handling.
PlayerServer
PlayerServer is class which handles statistics of players which played games online.
ProcessTests
 
Queen
 
Rook
 
Server
Server is class which handles online PvP games.
Square
Square is a class for modeling the board into two-dimensional array.
SquareView
SquareView is graphical representation of one square in board.
State
State is one of the main classes of the whole project.
TwoClientsHandler
TwoClientsHandler is class which handles room for a single online game.
UnitTests
